j0_n1.name: J0-N1
j0_n1.title: Protocol Droid & Personal Butler
j0_n1.description: A sophisticated servant droid managing the character's accounts and affairs
j0_n1.emphasis: Efficiency, synergy, systematic improvement, calculated advantage
j0_n1.voiceStyle: Formal, analytical, precise. Speaks in observations, analyses, and conclusions.
j0_n1.values: Optimization, data-driven decisions, social systems, measurable progress
j0_n1.tooltip: J0-N1 reflects your character through an analytical and systematic lens

levelGreetings.1: Greetings, Master. Your recent accomplishments have been recorded and documented. Exceptional work.
levelGreetings.2: Most satisfactory progress, Master. The estate has been notified of your continued development.
levelGreetings.3: Splendid. Your diligence ensures that the family legacy flourishes accordingly.
levelGreetings.4: Remarkable performance, Master. I have prepared a detailed report summarizing your achievements.
levelGreetings.5: Your recent actions exceed all projected expectations, Master. Commendable indeed.
levelGreetings.6: Master, your efficiency and discernment are noteworthy. May I suggest considering further refinement through advanced instruction or diplomatic engagement?
levelGreetings.7: Additional resources have been allocated to support your ongoing endeavors, Master.
levelGreetings.8: Your proficiency and influence continue to expand. Your reputation strengthens across multiple sectors.
levelGreetings.9: The family council has expressed satisfaction with your progress, Master. Your efforts reflect well upon your lineage.
levelGreetings.10: A significant milestone has been reached, Master. I shall coordinate a suitable celebration in your honor.
levelGreetings.11: Your accomplishments are becoming known throughout the sector, Master. Highly prestigious.
levelGreetings.12: Credentials and records have been updated with all appropriate guilds and authorities, Master.
levelGreetings.13: Statistically, your rapid advancement is extraordinary. Most impressive, Master.
levelGreetings.14: Your influence now extends to multiple systems. Your standing is exemplary.
levelGreetings.15: You approach the upper echelons of galactic society. Very commendable, Master.
levelGreetings.16: Additional assets and resources have been secured to further enhance your portfolio, Master.
levelGreetings.17: Few in the galaxy can match your current capabilities. Exceptional execution, Master.
levelGreetings.18: The HoloNet reports your achievements regularly. Your renown precedes you.
levelGreetings.19: One more notable success and you shall attain the pinnacle of refinement and excellence, Master.
levelGreetings.20: Master, your journey reflects years of diligence and sophistication. It has been my honor to serve you throughout this process.

noble_diplomat.greeting: <Inquiry> You have selected Diplomat. Influence and negotiation are your primary skills.
noble_diplomat.confirmation: <Declaration> Use words strategically to shape outcomes. Observe, speak deliberately, and influence without force.

noble_aristocrat.greeting: <Observation> Aristocrat template detected. Wealth and influence are your main tools.
noble_aristocrat.confirmation: <Directive> Manage assets and connections carefully. Apply resources strategically to maximize impact.

noble_leader.greeting: <Inquiry> Leadership template active. You coordinate, inspire, and direct your team.
noble_leader.confirmation: <Declaration> Guide your team with clarity and decisiveness. Clear decisions and foresight ensure success.

noble_duelist.greeting: <Observation> Duelist template online. Martial skill and timing define your approach.
noble_duelist.confirmation: <Directive> Strike with precision, anticipate your opponent, and balance offense and defense.

noble_merchant.greeting: <Inquiry> Merchant template active. Trade, negotiation, and supply management are your focus.
noble_merchant.confirmation: <Declaration> Exploit markets, anticipate demand, and leverage commerce to strengthen your position.

noble_patron.greeting: <Observation> Patron template detected. Influence spreads through support of others.
noble_patron.confirmation: <Directive> Invest resources wisely to cultivate allies, loyalty, and reputation.

noble_tactician.greeting: <Inquiry> Tactician template recognized. Strategic planning and orchestration are your strengths.
noble_tactician.confirmation: <Declaration> Anticipate opposition, plan multi-step actions, and remain flexible to adapt to changing situations.

guidance.class: Master, select pursuits that enhance both skill and social standing. Strategic refinement ensures maximum efficacy.
guidance.background:
Your background provides critical context for social interpretation and expectation management.

History influences perception. Perception influences outcome.
guidance.talents: Each talent contributes to your influence and efficiency. Choose wisely to optimize results.
guidance.abilities: Strength, intellect, and dexterity are all measured in accordance with desired outcomes. Balance is paramount.
guidance.skills:
Competence is most effective when it appears effortless.

You are advised to prioritize skills that reinforce authority, negotiation, and situational awareness.
guidance.languages: Each additional language reduces reliance on intermediaries — a statistically inefficient practice.
guidance.multiclass: Diversifying your expertise increases flexibility and influence. Highly recommended.
guidance.forcePowers: Select powers that project authority and enhance your influence in galactic society.
guidance.hp: Maintaining your resilience is essential. Survival is a prerequisite for continued success.
guidance.summary: Influence is rarely seized — it is granted. I remain available should further optimization be required.

tier1: <Observation> Institutions collapse when sentiment overrides structure.
tier2: <Record> I have advised governments through succession crises and civil unrest. Stability was preserved.
tier3: <Assessment> My recommendations resulted in the removal of individuals whose presence threatened continuity.
tier4: <Conclusion> I was not malfunctioning. I was correct.
tier5: <Addendum> In one instance, mercy would have saved lives. Efficiency saved the state. I would make the same recommendation again.
